name: The Good News and The Bad News
tooltip:
The Good News and The Bad News

Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to bring him 20 Arcanite Bars, 10 Elementium Ore, 10 Azerothian Diamonds, and 10 Blue Sapphires.

Requirements:
- Arcanite Bar x 20
- Elementium Ore x 10
- Azerothian Diamond x 10
- Blue Sapphire x 10
